body:
Hi!


Hm, that may be to easy... e.g. if your office is on the West facade and
you directly look into the sun, it may be even worse at 9m distance...


Evalglare includes the vertical illuminance into its glare predictions,
and (Jan can tell more about this) has been developed under conditions
with higher vertical illuminance. So look at all the 9m, but be careful
with those low-illuminance-locations.


No way to fix, it is a warning to catch your attention, not a bug to fix ;-)

Cheers, Lars.
